title: Button, 19th century
description:
Circular, convex button showing ornament of shield with heraldic devices, men supporters, leaf ornament below and crown above. Brass backs and shanks. On reverse: "Moos Paris".

Component -a is on card i80
Component -b is on card C
Component -c is on card E

tombstone.epitaph: Button, 19th century. Copper, silver plated, brass. 1931-59-179-a/c.
